channel.title: [508] NPC help
channel.description:
How would I spawn an npc in a 508? I know this is kind of an easy question, but I'm used to 317's and their 'autospawn' file...I've done "::npc ####" and the npc appears, but then it disappears when I close down the server and start it back up.
Any help?

item.title: [508] NPC help
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Thanks! Didn’t even know that was there.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] NPC help
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Ok this is easy to fix

[ul][li]In the main server folder open the folder called Bin[/li]
[li]Then open the folder called Data[/li]
[li]Then open the folder called npcs[/li]
[li]After that open Npcspawn.cfg [/li][/ul]

You should see something like this

// ID AX AY HI NEX NEY SWX SWY Name //--God Wars Dungeon spawn = 6203 2924 5325 2 0 0 0 0 K'ril Tsutsaroth spawn = 6247 2900 5265 0 0 0 0 0 Commander Zilyana spawn = 6222 2833 5305 2 0 0 0 0 Kree'Arra spawn = 6260 2872 5362 2 0 0 0 0 General Graardor

Just add the npc you want for example if i wanted to add hans iat lumbridge i would do

spawn	=	0	3232	3232	0	0	0	0	0	hans

then add it to my npcspawn.cfg

// ID AX AY HI NEX NEY SWX SWY Name //--God Wars Dungeon spawn = 6203 2924 5325 2 0 0 0 0 K'ril Tsutsaroth spawn = 6247 2900 5265 0 0 0 0 0 Commander Zilyana spawn = 6222 2833 5305 2 0 0 0 0 Kree'Arra spawn = 6260 2872 5362 2 0 0 0 0 General Graardor spawn = 0 3232 3232 0 0 0 0 0 hans

Read full topic
